tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_traffic_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR,
    destination_ip VARCHAR,
    port INT,
    protocol VARCHAR,
    bytes_transferred INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_ip VARCHAR(255),
  destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
  traffic_type VARCHAR(50),
  traffic_amount INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE suspicious_activity (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_type VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  detection_method TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    protocol VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE suspicious_activity_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    action_taken VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE cyber_threats (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    threat_type VARCHAR(50),
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Network_Traffic_Data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    data_size INT,
    threat_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE Suspicious_Activity_Logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_description TEXT,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    severity_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE Cyber_Threat_Events (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    action_taken TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Alert_Notifications (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    notification_type VARCHAR(50),
    message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    recipient_email VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    ip_address VARCHAR(15),
    mac_address VARCHAR(17),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR(15),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(15),
    protocol VARCHAR(10),
    data_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE suspicious_activity (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR(15),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(15),
    alert_message VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE cyber_threats (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    threat_name VARCHAR(50),
    threat_level VARCHAR(10),
    description TEXT,
    prevention_method TEXT
);
